author: Author
title: Title
reason: Perhaps the cause is one of the following
notInChannel: Bot/You are not in a voice channel (you must first run the /music play command)
otherChannel: The bot is already in another voice channel
veryLongQuery: Query cannot be longer than 40 characters
addedInQueue: The track has been added to the queue.
disconnected: {member} disconnected the bot from the voice channel
queuePop: {title} has been removed from the queue
